compact.description: Compact uncompacted issues into feature summaries

output.description: Write LLM context to file (for external LLM processing)
output.name: output

input.description: Read LLM response from file and apply changes
input.name: input

init.description: Initialize a .centy folder in the current project

force.description: Skip interactive prompts and use defaults
force.name: force

llm-auto-close.description: Auto-close issues when LLM completes work
llm-auto-close.name: llm-auto-close

llm-update-status.description: Update status to in-progress when LLM starts
llm-update-status.name: llm-update-status

llm-allow-direct-edits.description: Allow LLM to directly edit issue files
llm-allow-direct-edits.name: llm-allow-direct-edits

examples: <%= config.bin %> start --yes  # Auto-install daemon if missing

yes.description: Automatically install daemon if missing (skip prompt)
yes.name: yes

update.description: Update project to a target version (runs migrations)

target.description: Target version to update to (defaults to daemon version)
target.name: target

version.description: Get project version info and comparison with daemon

file.description: Path to the file to add
file.name: file

add:asset.description: Add an asset to an issue, PR, or as a shared asset

issue.description: Issue ID or display number to attach the asset to
issue.name: issue

pr.description: PR ID or display number to attach the asset to
pr.name: pr

shared.description: Add as a shared asset (accessible by all issues/PRs)
shared.name: shared

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

add:plan.description: Add or update an issue's plan

file.description: Path to the plan file (reads from stdin if not provided)
file.name: file

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

examples: <%= config.bin %> assign issue abc123-uuid alice bob

project.name: project

<%= config.bin %> create doc -t "API Reference" -c "# API

Documentation here"

slug.description: Custom slug (auto-generated from title if not provided)
slug.name: slug

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

create:issue.description: Create a new issue in the .centy folder
examples: <%= config.bin %> create issue --title "Bug in login" --priority high
<%= config.bin %> create issue -t "Add feature" -d "Implement dark mode"

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

examples: <%= config.bin %> create org-issue -o centy-io -t "API design" -d "Standardize API patterns"

projects.description: Comma-separated list of project paths this issue references
projects.name: projects

create:org.description: Create a new organization to group projects

slug.description: Custom slug (auto-generated from name if not provided)
slug.name: slug

create:pr.description: Create a new pull request in the .centy folder
examples: <%= config.bin %> create pr -t "Bug fix" -s bugfix/123 --target main

source.description: Source branch name (auto-detected if not provided)
source.name: source

project.description: Project name or path (defaults to current directory)
project.name: project

create:user.description: Create a new user in the project
examples: <%= config.bin %> create user --id john-doe --name "John Doe" --email john@example.com

id.description: User ID (slug format, auto-generated from name if not provided)
id.name: id
